data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
In the minute 4, In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gangwon are caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Incheon Utd's Yang Jun-ah is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Gangwon.
Gangwon have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 14, Lee Hyeon-sik (Gangwon) has received a first yellow card.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Incheon Utd takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 26, Incheon Utd are whistled for offside.
Lee Yeong-jae of Gangwon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Gangwon are pushing forward but Han Kook-young's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 34, Su-Beom Kim puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Incheon Utd needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Incheon Utd drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Kim Kyung-jung (Gangwon) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Kim Ji-hyeon extends Gangwon's lead to 2-0.
Free kick Incheon Utd.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
In the minute 47, Song Shi-uh is replacing Kim Jun-beom for the away team.
Incheon Utd are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Incheon Utd drives forward and Song Shi-uh gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 51, Incheon Utd's Yang Jun-ah attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Gangwon are whistled for offside.
Incheon Utd are caught offside.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 57, In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Incheon Utd's Song Shi-uh misses with an attempt on goal.
Incheon Utd make their second substitution with Kim Ho-nam replacing Kim Jeong-ho.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Gangwon.
Incheon Utd's Elias Aguilar is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Incheon Utd.
In the minute 60, Lee Hyeon-sik of Gangwon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
In the minute 63, Gangwon takes a corner from the right.
Incheon Utd's Kim Ho-nam misses with an attempt on goal.
Free kick Gangwon.
In the minute 66, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kim Ji-hyeon.
Kim Ho-nam (Incheon Utd) is red-carded and dismissed.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Incheon Utd.
Gangwon are pushing forward but Kim Ji-hyeon's finish is wide of the goal.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Cho Ji-hun is on a sub for Kim Ji-hyeon for Gangwon.
Elias Aguilar (Incheon Utd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team replace Kim Kyung-jung with Chae Gwang-hoon.
In the minute 73, Gangwon are coming forward and Cho Ji-hun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Goal! Stefan Mugosa pulls one back to make it 2-1.
Goal! Gangwon extend their lead to 3-1 through Lee Hyeon-sik.
Ko Mu-yeol with an assist there.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Kim Do-hyeok with Choi Beom-kyeong.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 83, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Gangwon's Ko Mu-yeol misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jeong Ji-yong is on a sub for Lee Hyeon-sik for Gangwon.
Mun Ji-hwan (Incheon Utd) has received a first yellow card.
Lee Yeong-jae is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Gangwon drive upfield and Chae Gwang-hoon gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Chuncheon.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ko Mu-yeol (Gangwon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lee Yeong-jae is back on the pitch.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
